blogPost.title: What will happen to the Republican Party? @CindyMcCain, a member of the Biden-Harris transition advisory council and widow of Republican Senator John McCain, tells “The Economist Asks” podcast “this party may split” https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 共和党会发生什么？拜登-哈里斯过渡顾问委员会成员、共和党参议员约翰-麦凯恩的遗孀@辛迪-麦凯恩告诉《经济学家问》播客 "这个党可能会分裂" https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ。
共和黨會發生什麼？拜登-哈里斯過渡顧問委員會成員、共和黨參議員約翰-麥凱恩的遺孀@辛迪-麥凱恩告訴《經濟學家問》播客 "這個黨可能會分裂" https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ。

previous.title: In 1796 Edward Jenner, a physician, produced the first true vaccine—one that creates immunity without infection https://t.co/KyX6CnDGRc

localize.full_text: 1796年，医生爱德华-詹纳生产出了第一种真正的疫苗--一种无需感染就能产生免疫力的疫苗https://t.co/KyX6CnDGRc。
1796年，醫生愛德華-詹納生產出了第一種真正的疫苗--一種無需感染就能產生免疫力的疫苗https://t.co/KyX6CnDGRc。

next.title: Vladimir Putin still commands the television channels that helped him to come to power, but it is Alexei Navalny who dominates politics on Russia’s internet https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt

localize.full_text: 弗拉基米尔-普京仍然指挥着帮助他上台的电视频道，但在俄罗斯互联网上主导政治的是阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt。
弗拉基米爾-普京仍然指揮着幫助他上臺的電視頻道，但在俄羅斯互聯網上主導政治的是阿列克謝-納瓦爾尼https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt。
